department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Purchase of 2 cross-country ski trail groomers including training and aftersales services.
description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on the 29 November 2022.
full_summary:
### 5P047-220162: Acquisition of 2 Cross-Country Ski Trail Groomers
### [English and French Titles]

#### Solicitation Details
* **Publication Date**: October 31, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 29, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3705751084

#### Tender Status
This tender is closed.

#### Requirements
Parks Canada Agency (PC) requires the acquisition of 2 cross-country ski trail groomers with the following specifications:
* A one-day training session
* Three-year aftersales services and warranty
* Delivery to the Saint-Jean-des-Piles sector of La Mauricie National Park (Quebec) by January 30, 2023

#### Tender Evaluation Criteria
Bids will be evaluated based on the **lowest price** submitted.

#### Documentation and Bid Submission
All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the **Tender Closing Date**. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

#### Contact Information
For more information, kindly contact:
* **Luc Brunet**, Procurement Officer (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [luc.brunet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:luc.brunet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Related Information
* **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14506022?extsite=MTQ1MDYwMjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **Trade Agreements**: This solicitation is subject to the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, among others

Note: I added a heading to match the one used in the original tender notice. Removed unnecessary information, and reformatted it for better readability.
